video.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
video.synopsis: After uncovering a mysterious amulet, an average teen assumes an unlikely destiny and sets out to save two worlds. Created by Guillermo del Toro.

episodes.synopsis: As a new day dawns in Arcadia, two trolls are locked in an epic battle with major consequences for the human world -- and one human boy in particular.
episodes.title: Becoming: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Still reeling from the discovery of the amulet's power, a stunned Jim meets his new mentors and learns he's been tasked with a sacred responsibility.
episodes.title: Becoming: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Toby tour Heartstone Trollmarket, where Jim begins his training and the presence of the first human Trollhunter stirs up bitter resentment.
episodes.title: Wherefore Art Thou, Trollhunter?

episodes.synopsis: While Jim gets a crash course in troll history, big problems -- and a bully -- await him in the human world. What better time for his first mission?
episodes.title: Gnome Your Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Jim tries to get closer to Claire on a school field trip to the museum, only to learn that the museum's curator, Ms. Nomura, has an unsettling secret.
episodes.title: Waka Chaka!

episodes.synopsis: Jim preps for a high-stakes rematch against Draal, the amulet's seemingly rightful heir. But their animosity gives way to a surprising partnership.
episodes.title: Win Lose or Draal

episodes.synopsis: Armed with an ancient troll-hunting tool, Jim and Toby set out to unmask the Changelings living among them. Claire makes Jim a tempting offer.
episodes.title: To Catch a Changeling

episodes.synopsis: While Draal settles into his new digs, Jim volunteers to babysit so he can find out whether Claire's little brother, Enrique, is a Changeling.
episodes.title: Adventures in Trollsitting

episodes.synopsis: Jim's 16th birthday is full of surprises, including the arrival of a terrifying new species of troll that's immune to the effects of sunlight.
episodes.title: Bittersweet Sixteen

episodes.synopsis: Draal gives Jim a troll-made totem to help curb his anxiety about Claire. But Jim's newfound overconfidence leads him to a startling realization.
episodes.title: Young Atlas

episodes.synopsis: As Claire grows increasingly suspicious, Jim's mom invites Strickler over for dinner, where the tension is so thick, you could cut it with a knife.
episodes.title: Recipe for Disaster

episodes.synopsis: The Killahead Bridge is complete, but the door to the Darklands still won't open. Jim is forced to tell Claire the truth when she becomes a target.
episodes.title: Claire and Present Danger

episodes.synopsis: Two fateful battles unfold when Bular and Strickler order Jim to unlock the portal and free Gunmar and his Gumm-Gumm Army from the Darklands.
episodes.title: The Battle of Two Bridges

episodes.synopsis: Claire gets her first look at Heartstone Trollmarket, and Jim receives a ghostly summons. Elsewhere, Strickler awakens an ancient assassin.
episodes.title: Return of the Trollhunter

episodes.synopsis: Jim searches for a way to kill Gunmar so Claire can bring her brother back home. A power-hungry Strickler returns to Arcadia with Angor Rot.
episodes.title: Mudslinging

episodes.synopsis: The heroes launch a dangerous quest to find the first Triumbric Stone. Angor Rot concocts a charm that links Strickler and Barbara's fates.
episodes.title: Roaming Fees May Apply

episodes.synopsis: A barely recognizable Blinky experiences the highs and lows of being human. Angor Rot marks Jim for a fate that's worse than death.
episodes.title: Blinky's Day Out

episodes.synopsis: The heroes' search for the second Triumbric Stone takes them deep into unfamiliar marshlands. Claire asks Jim to be her dance partner.
episodes.title: The Shattered King

episodes.synopsis: Toby and Claire take on a Trollhunter task so Jim can win a Spring King challenge. In the process, they learn to master new weapons.
episodes.title: Airheads

episodes.synopsis: A horde of pixies descends on Arcadia Oaks High, sending the student body into a tailspin. Angor Rot comes to Jim with a surprising proposal.
episodes.title: Where Is My Mind?

episodes.synopsis: The Changeling posing as Claire's little brother throws a house party for the trolls of Arcadia. Jim and Toby look for a way to take Strickler's ring.
episodes.title: Party Monster

episodes.synopsis: Every second counts when Jim turns to a time-stopping Kairosect to snatch Strickler's ring, save his mother and find the second Triumbric Stone.
episodes.title: It's About Time

episodes.synopsis: A troll queen arrives from afar to take AAARRRGGHH!!! back to his homeland, revealing his devastating secret. Strickler asks Jim for protection.
episodes.title: Wingmen

episodes.synopsis: A reluctant Jim joins forces with Strickler to keep Barbara alive. Gnome Chompsky returns from the Darklands with important news about Enrique.
episodes.title: Angor Management

episodes.synopsis: With Barbara's life hanging in the balance, Jim races to break the spell that bonds her to Strickler. Angor Rot attacks Toby and Claire.
episodes.title: A Night to Remember

episodes.synopsis: The heroes brace for Angor Rot's inevitable invasion and prepare for the fight of their lives. Jim locates the last Triumbric Stone.
episodes.title: Something Rotten This Way Comes

episodes.synopsis: With Jim still trapped in the Darklands searching for Enrique, his friends rally to bring him back. But the Troll Tribunal has other ideas.
episodes.title: Escape from the Darklands

episodes.synopsis: Claire recruits NotEnrique for a secret mission, while bully Steve stirs up trouble at school. In the Darklands, Jim meets "The Skullcrusher."
episodes.title: Skullcrusher

episodes.synopsis: A familiar foe comes to Jim's aid in the Darklands. Back in Arcadia, Toby's distracting new headgear picks up an important clue.
episodes.title: Grand Theft Otto

episodes.synopsis: As Gunmar readies to destroy Jim in the Darklands, Blinky and the gang strike a deal with the Janus Order in their quest to revive an old friend.
episodes.title: KanjigAAARRRGGHH!!!

episodes.synopsis: Hope springs from an unlikely source when Gunmar learns that Jim's friends are in the Darklands on a mission to bring him home.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Now out of the Darklands and readjusting to life in Arcadia, Jim and the team must face the consequences of their risky actions.
episodes.title: Hiss Hiss, Bang Bang

episodes.synopsis: Multiple problems plague a frazzled Jim when his amulet goes on the fritz and Claire invites him to meet her parents at a family barbecue.
episodes.title: Hero with a Thousand Faces

episodes.synopsis: When an oozy creature shows up in Arcadia, Jim and the gang set out to find it -- while playing parents to two sacks of flour for a school assignment.
episodes.title: Just Add Water

episodes.synopsis: In a revealing flashback episode, Otto and Dictatious vie for Gunmar's ear while an increasingly paranoid Steve finds an unlikely ally.
episodes.title: Creepslayerz

episodes.synopsis: Señor Uhl sentences Jim and his friends to detention while Queen Usurna gathers evidence of a conspiracy. Draal comes face to face with Gunmar.
episodes.title: The Reckless Club

episodes.synopsis: Facing serious accusations from the Tribunal, Jim gets the chance to see what his life would be like if he'd never found the amulet.
episodes.title: Unbecoming

episodes.synopsis: Jim stands trial for unleashing Gunmar while his friends race to clear his name. If convicted, he'll be sent to "The Deep," a dark realm of no return.
episodes.title: Mistrial and Error

episodes.synopsis: A monumental loss carries a warning from beyond the grave as Gunmar marches for Heartstone Trollmarket. Can the team pull together to save the day?
episodes.title: In the Hall of the Gumm-Gumm King

episodes.synopsis: With the trolls hiding out in Arcadia, AAARRRGGHH!!! goes undercover to see what Gunmar is up to. A potential rival brings out Jim's jealous side.
episodes.title: Night Patroll

episodes.synopsis: Toby gets caught in the crosshairs when a troll goes missing and the city cracks down on crime. An ancient voice refuses to be silenced.
episodes.title: Arcadia's Most Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Something strange is brewing at school, where the teachers are more agitated than usual. Claire's illness shows disturbing side effects.
episodes.title: Bad Coffee

episodes.synopsis: Toby and Darci ask Jim and Claire on a double date. Gunmar returns from his travels, now armed with the knowledge to bring forth the Eternal Night.
episodes.title: So I'm Dating a Sorceress

episodes.synopsis: While Gunmar searches for the Staff of Avalon, Jim and Toby head into the Shadow Realm to rescue Claire's spirit and return it to her body.
episodes.title: The Exorcism of Claire Nunez

episodes.synopsis: When Barbara's art obsession leads to an "aha!" moment, she demands Jim tell her the truth. Dictatious reveals Gunmar's plans to resurrect Angor Rot.
episodes.title: Parental Guidance

episodes.synopsis: With the future of two worlds at stake, the team races to find Merlin's Tomb -- and the Staff of Avalon -- before Gunmar can get his hands on it.
episodes.title: The Oath

episodes.synopsis: A long-dormant ally shows Jim and his friends what really happened at the Battle of Killahead. Gunmar awakens Morgana, and Angor Rot plots his revenge.
episodes.title: For the Glory of Merlin

episodes.synopsis: Señor Uhl interrupts an important mission with an awkward ultimatum for Jim: help two new students fit in ... or face a repeat of sophomore year.
episodes.title: In Good Hands

episodes.synopsis: Merlin has a plan to go to war, but it's Jim's choice to make. Blinky and AAARRRGGHH!!! search for allies. Gunmar uses Barbara to get what he wants.
episodes.title: A House Divided

episodes.synopsis: A greatly changed Jim renews his Trollhunter training but struggles to accept his new reality. Gunmar and Morgana rally the troops for an attack.
episodes.title: Jimhunters

episodes.synopsis: The Eternal Night covers Arcadia in shadow, leading to a long-awaited showdown between Gunmar and the newly transformed Trollhunter.
episodes.title: The Eternal Knight Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: An epic battle comes to a head in the darkness as Jim and his friends push back against Morgana. But without Merlin, how will they stop her?
episodes.title: The Eternal Knight Pt. 2
